numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The graph shows many colored players.
4. The number of colored players is greater than the number of coaches.
5. I wonder why there is a big difference between players and coaches.
6. This difference has a big impact on me and my community.
7. Many black people have a dream.
8. Many black people are afraid of what might happen.
9. Many black people are afraid of what might not happen.
10. The headline is: Why are there so many colored players than coaches!?
